name: Jawad Iskandar

experience.title: AI Training Specialist
bullets: Evaluate technical outputs for accuracy, relevance, and quality using structured review workflows and detailed written feedback.
Collaborate with distributed teams and meet strict quality standards and deadlines in a remote environment.
Document findings and recommendations to support iterative improvements and reliable system behavior.
experience.techStack: AI Model Evaluation, Data Annotation, Quality Assessment, AI Training Workflows

experience.title: Business Specialist
bullets: Delivered technology solutions for 50+ small and mid-sized business clients, increasing ROI by 18% and improving workflow efficiency by 30% through migrations to integrated Apple ecosystems and cloud solutions (iCloud, Apple Business Manager, third-party SaaS).

Conducted needs analyses, on-site consultations, and workshops; translated technical topics (device deployment, security, mobile workflows, productivity) into clear guidance for non-technical stakeholders.
Supported device deployment and management by leveraging Apple Business Manager and MDM systems (e.g., Jamf) to implement scalable configurations aligned to business requirements.
Improved quarterly forecasting accuracy by 25% by maintaining precise CRM data (Salesforce, Apple CRM) and tracking performance trends to refine pipeline strategies.
Mentored team members and collaborated cross-functionally on business events and trainings; consistently exceeded customer satisfaction and solution adoption KPIs.
experience.techStack: Apple Business Manager, Jamf (MDM), iCloud, SaaS integrations, CRM (Salesforce, Apple CRM)

education.coursework: Cloud Computing Essentials, Systems Analysis and Design, Information Systems Audit and Control, Data Mining for Business Applications, Programming for Analytics

projects.name: Cloud Computing Projects (AWS & Azure)
projects.description:
Improved multi-cloud security, reliability, and storage efficiency by 35–100% across AWS and Azure environments through end-to-end hands-on configuration.

Designed and deployed 3+ AWS VPC architectures with CIDR planning, custom subnets, route tables, Internet Gateways, and 2 Site-to-Site VPN tunnels using CGWs, VGWs, and IKEv1 configurations.

Strengthened network protection by implementing 20+ Network ACL rules and creating 6+ Security Groups with IP-restricted SSH/RDP access.

Managed S3 versioning and authored JSON bucket policies; configured Azure Storage Accounts/Blob Containers and used snapshots to validate recovery with zero-data-loss restores.

Technologies/Skills: AWS (VPC, EC2, S3), VPN (CGW/VGW, IKEv1), NACLs, Security Groups, JSON bucket policies, Azure (VMs, Storage Accounts, Blob Storage, Snapshots), Access control (RBAC/IAM concepts).

projects.name: Interactive U.S. COVID-19 Data Pipeline & Visualization
projects.description:
Built a Python ETL pipeline that processed 3,000+ U.S. counties worth of COVID-19 data, improving data accessibility by 90% through automated cleaning and visualization.

Automated ingestion of live datasets and transformed time-series data into analysis-ready formats, reducing manual refresh effort to seconds.

Designed interactive summaries and dashboards to support rapid end-user analysis and improved interpretability of trends.

Delivered a reproducible Jupyter workflow with reliable outputs and clear documentation for reuse.

Technologies/Skills: Python, Pandas, GeoPandas, Folium, Matplotlib, Jupyter, ETL, Data wrangling, Time-series analysis.

projects.name: StatementProMax — Bank Statement Converter & Financial Analysis Platform
projects.description:
Designed and developed a client-side web application for bank statement conversion and financial analysis using only browser-based technologies.

Built a PDF → Excel conversion workflow and multi-sheet exports to support reporting and review.

Implemented an interactive dashboard and local-only storage to support secure, user-friendly analysis.

Deployed and maintained a public demo and documentation to improve usability and maintainability.

Technologies/Skills: JavaScript (ES6), HTML/CSS, Chart.js, SheetJS (XLSX), IndexedDB, LocalStorage, GitHub Pages.

awards: Introduction to Data Science in Python
